10/10 Extremely Fun, beyond amazing user experience and one of your most friendliest fan bases out there.

Not every game/trial is the same, often it is fun to have a play style in mind. 
Other times i am simply going for mini objectives each trial.
On rare occasions you will unfortunately encounter the killer or survivor group that completely counters your build or mindset at the time. 
But in my opinion the best trials are where the killer and survivors mutely agree to rack up blood points in every category while as many multipliers were added before the match.

All in all a fun game with tremendous ups that outweigh the downs.
I hope this game never loses support!

Edit: If you enjoy the game as much as I do, for the love of god NEVER PLAY SOLO till you're towards the end of the month. From the 13th - 27th of each month the solo que is swamped with trash survivors and cruel Killers. In my opinion, they are NOT a good representation of the community. All-in-all the matchmaking is a searing melting pot for about two weeks after the 13th; God speed if you don't have friends.
it's like tag, except u die

Hi. I play dead by daylight.  Yes I am a Nancy main.  Yes, I have an unhealthy liking towards Steve Harrington.  Yes I am aware he is a fictional character.  I have recently watched the Texas Chainsaw Massacre, and yes I did shout at the TV "NO WAY IT'S JUST LIKE DEAD BY DAYLIGHT!"  I recommend this game to those who enjoy horror movies and those who simp for fictional characters.  Good day to you all.  10/10

It's pretty fun, it can be intense at times which can be really exhilarating but also,oddly enough, exhausting for a video game. Movement can take a bit of getting used to, especially trying to break the killers' ankles, its not incredibly hard but not very easy. Overall it's a really fun game to play with friends or to be the killer and chase the survivors and watch them struggle while you kill them one by one. Good luck.
Its alright I guess, if you are toxic or plan on tunneling stay away please.
